CustomField.formula: ( Fee_Comm__c * Volume_Transactional__c * Term_Tenor__c ) + ( Value_fee__c * Value__c * Term_Tenor__c ) + ( Recurring_flat_fee__c * Term_Tenor__c ) + Flat_fee__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Fees (calculated) is an automatically calculated value based on the the expected 'volumes' multipled by the transaction 'Fees' and then annualised by the Term / Tenor (months).
CustomField.label: Total Fees (calculated)
